Vanessa Paradis, a French icon
subhead: Recognized today as both a singer and an actress, the artist still appears affected by the attacks she suffered early during her fame. With the release of her eighth album 'Le Retour des beaux jours' ('The Return of Sunny Days'), Paradis agreed to an interview, but remained on her guard.

headline: 'Pretending that environmental protection is just a concern for hipsters means leaving the working-class population to their fate'
subhead: Economist Lutz Sager writes in an op-ed for Le Monde that underserved communities are the first victims of air pollution, which causes 40,000 preventable deaths each year in France.

headline: Venice Film Festival: Noah Baumbach, Yorgos Lanthimos and Werner Herzog test our belief systems with layers of nuance
subhead: Several of the films that premiered at the beginning of the festival invited viewers to reflect on questions of identity.

headline: Ultra-processed foods cause negative health effects within weeks, study finds
subhead: In a clinical trial similar to those used for testing medicines, scientists studied the health impacts of a diet filled with ultra-processed foods. Results show that numerous biological processes are affected.

Mohammed VI, Islam and the Islamists
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (6/6). His status as 'commander of the faithful' has given the Moroccan king a unique aura and has enabled him to push back against the ambitions of Islamists, whose political project and way of life he rejects.

headline: Air quality in Paris: Monitoring agency reports significant improvement over 10 years
subhead: According to Airparif, the independent body monitoring air quality in the Paris region, policies have had a 'significant and measurable impact.'

headline: Mohammed VI, the makhzen and the art of palace secrecy
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (5/6). In order to maintain his power, the Moroccan monarch relies on a handful of loyal supporters, most of whom he has known for decades. However, internal rivalries betray a certain nervousness, revealing the uncertainty surrounding the future of his reign.
